sentences.english: It was taken in Bromo National park.
sentences.chinese: 它拍摄于婆罗摩国家公园。

sentences.english: The quite demeanor of the Capricorn is easily misinterpreted as cold and hard hearted.
sentences.chinese: 摩羯的这种表现很容易让人误解为冷漠和硬心肠。

sentences.english: It covers what the apostle John saw in a vision on the Island of Patmos.
sentences.chinese: 它记录了使徒约翰在拔摩海岛所看到的异象。

sentences.english: The Maheshvara Heaven: Maheshvara is Sanskrit that means great ease.
sentences.chinese: 摩醯首罗天是梵语，翻成中文，就叫大自在天。

sentences.english: I am Mallika, the banker, a friend of the good Pandu here.
sentences.chinese: 我是银行家摩利卡，是潘杜在这儿的一位朋友。

sentences.english: The Mosel valley produces the best grapes for Germany's most famous wine, Riesling.
sentences.chinese: 此酒选用摩塞尔山谷出产的优质雷司令葡萄酿制而成。

sentences.english: The Soviet 36th Motorized Rifle Division and 5th Machine Gun Brigade opposed these forces.
sentences.chinese: 当面之敌为苏军第36摩步师和第5机枪旅。

sentences.english: Ensnared in maya, I am all but dead.
sentences.chinese: 在摩耶的诱捕下，我差点儿死去。

sentences.english: We are closing the prison at Guantánamo.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在关闭关塔纳摩的监狱。

sentences.english: Such is the vale of Blackmore.
the summer of 1959 was the last Moreno would see of it.
sentences.chinese: 1959年夏天，将是摩惹诺参观故地的最后机会。

sentences.english: Abu-Jamal's supporters say he didn't get a fair trial.
sentences.chinese: 阿布杰摩的支持者说，他并未受到公平的审判。

sentences.english: Deep excavation also leads to a large pile-soil relative displacement when the skin friction is totally mobilized.

sentences.english: Check out Capricorn man in love and understanding a Capricorn males behavior.

sentences.english: Virgo and Capricorn are also earth signs.
sentences.chinese: 处女和摩羯也是土象星座。

sentences.english: Many Capricorns are feeling the urge to merge so strongly right now.
sentences.chinese: 现在很多摩羯都感到结合的驱动力相当强烈。
